wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Bradford (20 December 1652 – 17 May 1731) was an English churchman and whig, bishop successively of Carlisle and Rochester.

response: * December 20 – Samuel Bradford, English churchman, Whig politician (d. 1731)
* May 17 – Samuel Bradford, English churchman, Whig politician (b. 1652)
* 1699 - The Credibility of the Christian Revelation, from its intrinsick Evidence, by Samuel Bradford (Bishop of Rochester)
